definition: lower body/euphemism for genitals/root and stem of plants
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Have him shift his lower body into a half-kneeling position, entering you from behind.
sentences.chinese: 让他扭转他的下体成半跪姿式，从后面插入。

sentences.english: Thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of thy father's sister: she is thy father's near kinswoman .
sentences.chinese: 不可露你姑母的下体，她是你父亲的骨肉之亲。

sentences.english: Neither shalt thou go up by steps unto mine altar, that thy nakedness be not discovered thereon.
sentences.chinese: 你上我的坛，不可用台阶，免得露出你的下体来。

sentences.english: It seems that one of the biggest concerns that women have about 'down there' is whether they are normal.
sentences.chinese: 似乎女性对她们下体最大的问题就是她们是否正常。

sentences.english: She shows her topsides, hides her bottom.
sentences.chinese: 她骄傲地展示上身，却仔细掩藏了下体。

sentences.english: Do not dishonor your father by having sexual relations with your mother.
sentences.chinese: 不可露你母亲的下体，羞辱了你父亲。

sentences.english: He filled the bottle with hot water and then pushed it into my private parts with his foot.
sentences.chinese: 他在瓶子里灌满热水，然后用脚将它塞进我的下体。
